column4: do i need to tweak anything on my hd 120Gb in ubuntu or is it OK by default? And i want to enable dma on my dvd and on my cdrw but where do i enable this so its on during boot?
/etc/hdparm.conf and look for dma cdrom on www.ubuntuforums.org
thx, now i have dma = on and it works like a charm,. Mostly i do a search on google and forget about ubuntu forum :-)
